content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Answer (a), (b), and (c). Briefly describe ONE specific historical change in business structures in the United States between 1870 and 1915. Briefly describe ONE specific historical effect of changes in business structures on United States society between 1870 and 1915. Briefly explain how ONE specific historical development between 1870 and 1915 addressed the impact of new business structures.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
